title: Automatically downloading nursery photos from ParentZone using Selenium
description: My son goes to a nursery part-time, and the nursery uses a system called ParentZone from Connect Childcare to send information between us (his parents) and nursery. Primarily, this is used to send us updates on the boring details of the day (what he’s had to eat, nappy changes and so on), and to send […]

title: Complementary engineering indicators
description: Last year I had the opportunity to watch Cat Swetel’s presentation The Development Metrics You Should Use (but Don’t). The information that could be gleaned from just tracking the start and finish date of work items was eye opening. If you’re using an issue tracker this information is probably already (perhaps with some light data

title: I am talking to my code
description: I am talking to my code but according to my cat, this is the least worrying.

title: Pizza commit
description:
Me:

$ git commit -m "Closes issue #13"
  * Remove obsolete reference to core entity
  * Refactor module generating values
  * Log every ac...

Colleague: “Hey, the pizza is heeeere”

Me:

* backspaces *
$ git commit -m "Fixes"

title: re:Invent 2019 - AWS API Gateway v2 for HTTP
description: AWS just announced support for HTTP APIs in AWS API Gateway v2.
